name: Mare Maran
description:
Assist Cyan break her curse placed on her by the Seabeast Venus throughout 20 levels. Score as high as you can and tread lightly.

------------------

Use [Arrow Keys] to move.

[X] to use one of three attacks.

[Z] to use a special. Use wisely as it drains your health.

[Enter] to pause during game play and to confirm/skip.

[Shift] to select ammo type and life count.
